entry.title: Why La Shebeen Prefers Conversations Over Soundtracks
entry.summary: La Shebeen, where the ambiance is as crafted as the drinks we pour. If you’ve ever visited—or been lucky enough…
entry.content:
La Shebeen, where the ambiance is as crafted as the drinks we pour. If you’ve ever visited—or been lucky enough to find us—you might have noticed something unusual: no thumping basslines, no curated playlists, and certainly no overplayed chart-toppers humming in the background. That’s right, La Shebeen has no music.

Before you raise your perfectly arched eyebrows and mutter, “What kind of bar doesn’t play music?” let us explain. We didn’t stumble into this decision accidentally. It’s a deliberate choice, born out of our philosophy, our identity, and, dare we say, our rebellion against the noise.

1. The Lost Art of Conversation

Remember the last time you had a meaningful conversation in a bar? Neither do we. Somewhere along the way, loud music replaced the low hum of human connection. At La Shebeen, we believe in bringing it back. Here, you don’t need to yell over a speaker just to discuss life, love, or your questionable choices.

We provide the space; you bring the stories.

2. We’re Not Competing with Spotify

Let’s be honest, no one can agree on a playlist. One person’s “banger” is another person’s headache. Instead of trying to cater to everyone’s eclectic tastes, we’ve decided to opt out entirely. Why play middleman when you’ve got your own earbuds at home?

What we do offer is a selection of locally crafted drinks as diverse as your music library. Pair your favorite Cape Town craft beer with the sweet sound of laughter. Trust us, it’s a vibe.

3. Authenticity Over Atmosphere

Plenty of bars rely on music to create a mood. At La Shebeen, the mood is created by the people who walk through our doors. Our atmosphere isn’t built on speakers and subwoofers—it’s in the clink of glasses, the shared smiles, and the collective warmth of being somewhere that feels a little off the beaten path.

Think of us as a sanctuary from the chaos.

4. The Soundtrack is Local

Cape Town is alive with its own music—the crashing of waves, the whisper of mountain breezes, the rhythm of city streets. Why compete with that? Step into La Shebeen, and you’re stepping into a space that honors its surroundings, rather than drowning them out.

5. Because Silence is Golden (and Underrated)

Alright, maybe not silence—there’s always someone debating the merits of Karoo agave versus Hout Bay gin. But the absence of music creates something rare: the ability to simply be present. To enjoy your drink without distraction. To let your thoughts breathe.

What’s the Catch?

We won’t lie—our no-music policy isn’t for everyone. If you’re looking for a nightclub or a dance floor, La Shebeen isn’t your spot. La Shebeen is not a disco. But if you’re seeking a bar where your voice matters more than the volume, you’ve found your place.

So come in, pull up a chair, and let the conversation flow. At La Shebeen, we’ve got the drinks covered—you just bring the words.

Cheers to a quieter kind of nightlife.
— The La Shebeen Team

entry.title: A Trip to Spier: How One Wine Tasting Redefined La Shebeen
entry.summary: If you know us at La Shebeen, you know we take our drinks seriously. Whether it’s a perfectly poured Cape…
entry.content:
If you know us at La Shebeen, you know we take our drinks seriously. Whether it’s a perfectly poured Cape Town craft beer, a bottle of Hout Bay gin, or a Karoo agave delight, we’re all about championing the best our region has to offer. So, when we decided it was time to level up our wine selection, we headed straight to the heart of Stellenbosch—Spier Wine Estate.

Spoiler alert: we didn’t leave empty-handed.

The Journey to Wine Nirvana 🍷

Picture this: rolling vineyards stretching to the horizon, the crisp Stellenbosch air, and us walking into the Spier tasting room like kids in a candy store. Our mission? To sample their lineup of whites, rosés, and reds and see if Spier could live up to its legendary reputation.

The first pour was a crisp white that danced on the palate like a summer breeze. Next came the rosé—a delicate yet bold expression of everything we love about South African wine. And then... the reds. Full-bodied, complex, and unapologetically delicious. It was like each glass was trying to outdo the last. Spoiled for choice doesn’t even begin to describe it.

Love at First Sip

By the time we made it through the tasting, the decision was unanimous: Spier wasn’t just good. It was extraordinary. These wines weren’t just something we enjoyed—they were something we needed to share with you.

After a spirited (and wine-fueled) team meeting, we decided to make Spier Wines the official standard at La Shebeen. Whether you’re into a zesty Sauvignon Blanc, a flirty rosé, or a bold Shiraz, you’ll now find Spier on our menu, ready to elevate your night.

Why Spier?

It’s not just about the wine (although trust us, the wine alone is reason enough). Spier is a local treasure. With over 300 years of history, a commitment to sustainability, and a passion for crafting exceptional wines, they embody everything we love about Cape Town’s artisan spirit.

Plus, there’s something about knowing your drink comes from just down the road that makes every sip taste a little better.

Come Taste the Difference

Starting now, Spier Wines are officially pouring at La Shebeen. Whether you’re dropping by for an intimate conversation, a quiet toast, or just a really good glass of wine, you’ll experience Stellenbosch’s finest in every pour.

So, next time you visit, grab a glass of Spier and let us know what you think. Or better yet, let the wine speak for itself.

Cheers to supporting local legends, one bottle at a time. 🥂

Discover the magic of Spier for yourself at La Shebeen.

entry.title: A Bard’s Tale of La Shebeen’s Divine Counter
entry.summary: Hearken, ye patrons and kindred spirits, to a tale as old as nectar itself, yet as fresh as the dawn…
entry.content:
Hearken, ye patrons and kindred spirits, to a tale as old as nectar itself, yet as fresh as the dawn upon the cresting hills! For I sing of La Shebeen, that hallowed haunt of mirth and revelry, which hath been graced by the gods with a gift most rare.

In the age when the world was young, and the gods themselves walked among the verdant groves, a piece of wood, hewn by divine hands, was gifted to the mortal realm. This was no ordinary timber, but a sacred relic, destined to grace the bar of La Shebeen. It bore the whispers of Olympus and the strength of Titans, awaiting its noble fate.

Under the careful gaze of skilled artisans, this celestial wood was shaped and molded, its destiny to support the elbows of weary travelers and the dreams of thirsty souls. Each curve and cut was a testament to the craftsman’s art, the wood bending to their will, as if Aphrodite herself charmed it to beauty.

Now, step into La Shebeen and behold the splendor! The gods themselves smile upon this place, their gift elevating it from mere public house to a pantheon of joy and fellowship. Raise your cups, dear friends, upon this divine counter, and let the nectar of the gods flow freely.

Rejoice, for La Shebeen has been reborn, not just as a bar, but as a monument to celestial grace and human craftsmanship, a place where the divine meets the merry hearts of men. Drink deep from the well of joy, and remember the tale of the bar counter given by the gods, finished by the king’s own elixir, a testament to the glory of old and new.

entry.title: Aliens Flock to La Shebeen for Out-of-this-World Chicken Wings
entry.summary: In a bizarre and hilarious turn of events, La Shebeen, the popular spot for braai enthusiasts, has become the go-to…
entry.content:
In a bizarre and hilarious turn of events, La Shebeen, the popular spot for braai enthusiasts, has become the go-to destination for extraterrestrial visitors craving a taste of Earth's finest culinary delights. Specifically, our world-famous chicken wings on the braai have captured the hearts (and taste buds) of our alien friends from outer space!

As the sun set on a typical South African afternoon, a group of curious extraterrestrials landed their spaceship in the parking lot, eager to indulge in the local cuisine. With their antennae twitching and their large, round eyes scanning the menu, they zeroed in on the mouthwatering chicken wings. And, oh, they were not disappointed!

Crispy, juicy, and full of flavor, the chicken wings on the braai at La Shebeen left the aliens in awe. They devoured the wings with reckless abandon, their long, slender fingers licking the sauce off with gusto. It was a sight to behold, as they danced and chirped in delight, their spaceship's headlights flashing in approval.

"We came to Earth seeking new life and new civilizations," said Zorvath, the leader of the alien group. "But we never expected to find such divine culinary creations! The chicken wings at La Shebeen are out of this world – literally!"

The aliens vowed to return with more of their friends, promising to bring their own secret sauce to share with the La Shebeen team. And, as they took off into the night sky, the sounds of their laughter and wing-induced euphoria echoed through the cosmos.

So, the next time you're enjoying a plate of La Shebeen's famous chicken wings, remember: you're not just satisfying your cravings, you're representing Earth's culinary prowess to the galaxy!

Come for the wings, stay for the extraterrestrial entertainment – only at La Shebeen!

entry.title: A Galactic Evening at La Shebeen: Chicken Strips and Unexpected Guests!
entry.summary: At La Shebeen, we proved that good food and interstellar company are a universal language! After an exhilarating evening of…
entry.content:
At La Shebeen, we proved that good food and interstellar company are a universal language! After an exhilarating evening of socializing with our newfound friends from outer space, we decided to whip up a last-minute feast. On the menu? Our world-famous chicken strips! It’s not every day you get to share your favorite Earth delicacies with extraterrestrial beings.

But wait, there's more. Our evening took a quirky turn when a slug (yes, a real slug!) made an unexpected appearance. We couldn't help but chuckle at the irony. There we were, enjoying chicken strips with aliens, and along slithers a slug, possibly hoping to find some lettuce. Oh, the disappointment on its tiny slug face when it realized La Shebeen isn't quite the 'Slug and Lettuce'!

It’s almost as if the universe was playing its own cosmic joke, giving a nod to the famous pub chain but with a La Shebeen twist. Sorry, little slug, no greens here – just crispy, delicious chicken and some out-of-this-world company!

So, here's to spontaneous intergalactic friendships, laughter, and the reminder that sometimes, the best evenings are those that go completely off script (and menu). And to our slug friend: better luck next time in your quest for lettuce! 🚀🐔🌌🌿
